name: Noodle
description:
Created for the Weekly Game Jam, Week 156: Noodle.

Controls for Title Crawl: Right arrow key to progress

Controls for Shooter: Left mouse to shoot, R to reload

Controls for Platformer: 1-4 to switch character, arrow keys to move (Up to Jump, Down to Accelerate with Telly)

Controls for Platformer Gun Sequence: Spacebar to shoot THE GUN
